casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Gray PAYNE. No. 114P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. R. Marcus Lodge, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been ] entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of March 2008 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
